details.script_description:
This script is a nightly test script for QMCPACK, running on Summit supercomputer. It performs the following steps:

1.  Checks out the QMCPACK git repository from GitHub.
2.  Builds QMCPACK for different configurations (Real-SoA, Real-Mixed-SoA, Complex-SoA, Complex-Mixed-SoA).
3.  Runs CTest to execute tests for each configuration.
4.  Logs the results of each test to a dedicated log file.
